sections.servicesTitle: What can I do for your business?
sections.aboutBio1: Computer Engineer with 5+ years of experience building technology solutions for businesses of all sizes — from local cooperatives to enterprises with hundreds of employees.
sections.aboutBio2: I specialize in creating systems that actually solve problems: from web platforms and e-commerce to enterprise management systems, AI automations, and team training. I work with budgets adaptable to your reality.
sections.aboutBio3: My approach is simple: understand your business first, build second. Every project I deliver is designed to grow with you.
